original_title: Naked Hollywood 4: Til Bad Behavior Do We Part
overview: A fun-filled wedding reception has everyone saying, "I do" to everything but marriage. In episode 4, Monica surprises even herself with the number of men she's had. Kim's all for settling down until her man gets marriage fever. And Lindsey gives the groom a very personal wedding gift!
title: Naked Hollywood 4: Til Bad Behavior Do We Part
